columns.name: lens_name
columns.description: The full name of the lens.

columns.name: workload_id
columns.description: The ID assigned to the workload.

columns.name: milestone_number
columns.description: The milestone number. A workload can have a maximum of 100 milestones.

columns.name: notes
columns.description: The notes associated with the workload.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The date and time of the last update.

columns.name: pillar_review_summaries
columns.description: A map from risk names to the count of how questions have that rating.

columns.name: risk_counts
columns.description: A map from risk names to the count of how questions have that rating.
